sections.heading: Injunctive relief in divorce actions; bond not required in certain casesEither party to an action for divorce may obtain injunctive relief as provided in Part V of Chapter 1 of Code Title V of Code Book I of Title 9 (R
sections.text: S. 9:371 et seq.) of the Revised Statutes without bond.Acts 1990, No. 1009, ยง4, e
